Announcement from your supervisor
ancm.content: This is an announcement for Haselwood Oo and Foat

ancm.title: ANNOUNCEMENT FROM YOUR SUPERVISOR
ancm.content:
Hi Linh,

I would like to invite you to a meeting at 10 am in Room A1.607.

Ly Tu Nga.

ancm.title: ANNOUNCEMENT FOR ONLINE COURSE EVALUATION SEMESTER 1, ACADEMIC YEAR 2020-2021
ancm.content:
Dear All Students,

Office of Quality Assurance would like to inform all students on Online Course Evaluation, Semester 1, Academic year 2020-2021

Survey channel: Edusoft Web

Survey period time:

Please sign up student’s edusoft account for schedule of course evaluation online survey.

Please follow these steps to complete surveys:

Sign up student’s edusoft account on https://edusoftweb.hcmiu.edu.vn/
Click on the Tab “Evaluation Teaching”
Do and save all surveys on time

ancm.title: ANNOUNCEMENT: ABOUT NAME LIST OF PHYSICAL TRAINING 1 AND PHYSICAL TRAINING 2 IN THE FIRST SEMESTER, ACADEMIC YEAR 2020-2021

ancm.title: FINAL EXAMINATION I GRADE 201
ancm.content:
Phòng Đào tạo Đại học thông báo danh sách trả I đến sinh viên.
Sinh viên xem danh sách tại đây.

ancm.title: MD TEST
ancm.content:
- [x] @mentions, #refs, [links](), **formatting**, and <del>tags</del> supported
- [x] list syntax required (any unordered or ordered list supported)
- [x] this is a complete item
- [ ] this is an incomplete item
